name: project-workflow
description: Seven integrated slash commands for complete project lifecycle: /explore-idea (validation), /plan-project (planning docs), /plan-feature (add features), /wrap-session (checkpoint), /continue-session (resume), /workflow (guidance), /release (safety checks). Use when: starting new projects, managing sessions across context windows, adding features to existing projects, or preparing releases with safety checks. Saves 35-55 minutes per project lifecycle. ↓ Creates PROJECT_BRIEF.md ↓ ↓ Creates
